mapper.sql: ID, DPRTCODE, DJLX, SQDH,TDMC, ZT, SQYY, JJCD, YQQX, SQBMID, SQRID, SQSJ, SPBMID, SPRID, SPSJ, SPYJ

B.ID, B.DPRTCODE, B.DJLX, B.SQDH,B.TDMC, B.ZT, B.SQYY, B.JJCD, B.YQQX, B.SQBMID, B.SQRID, B.SQSJ, B.SPBMID, B.SPRID, B.SPSJ, B.SPYJ, B.ZDJSRID, B.ZDJSRQ, B.ZDJSYY, U.REALNAME AS SQRREALNAME,U.USERNAME AS SQRUSERNAME,U2.REALNAME AS SPRREALNAME,U2.USERNAME AS SPRUSERNAME, U3.USERNAME AS JUSERNAME,U3.REALNAME AS JREALNAME, B1.NOREAD,B2.READALL, B00202.GLGD
mapper.select: select B.ID, B.DPRTCODE, B.DJLX, B.SQDH,B.TDMC, B.ZT, B.SQYY, B.JJCD, B.YQQX, B.SQBMID, B.SQRID, B.SQSJ, B.SPBMID, B.SPRID, B.SPSJ, B.SPYJ, B.ZDJSRID, B.ZDJSRQ, B.ZDJSYY, U.REALNAME AS SQRREALNAME,U.USERNAME AS SQRUSERNAME,U2.REALNAME AS SPRREALNAME,U2.USERNAME AS SPRUSERNAME from B_H_002 B left join T_USER U on B.SQRID = U.ID left join T_USER U2 on B.SPRID = U2.ID where B.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT B002.ID, B002.DPRTCODE, B002.DJLX, B002.SQDH,B002.TDMC, B002.ZT, B002.SQYY, B002.JJCD, B002.YQQX, B002.SQBMID, B002.SQRID, B002.SQSJ, B002.SPBMID, B002.SPRID, B002.SPSJ, B002.SPYJ,B00203.ID AS DETAILID,B00203.XJZT,B00203.XJDH, B017.ID AS KCLLID,B017.KCID,B017.SN, D008.BJH,D008.ZWMS,D008.YWMS,D008.CJJH,D008.HCLX,D008.JLDW, U.REALNAME AS SQRREALNAME,U.USERNAME AS SQRUSERNAME, D005.ZJH,D005.ZWMS AS ZZWMS,D005.YWMS AS ZYWMS FROM B_H_002 B002 LEFT JOIN B_H_00203 B00203 ON B002.ID = B00203.MAINID LEFT JOIN B_H_017 B017 ON B017.ID = B00203.KCLLID LEFT JOIN D_008 D008 ON D008.ID = B017.BJID left join T_USER U on B002.SQRID = U.ID left join D_005 D005 on D008.ZJH = D005.ZJH and D008.DPRTCODE = D005.DPRTCODE where B002.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: and ( UPPER(B.SQDH) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(B.TDMC) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') )

if.test: paramsMap != null and paramsMap.sqrqBegin != null and paramsMap.sqrqBegin != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.sqrqEnd != null and paramsMap.sqrqEnd != ''

mapper.insert: insert into B_H_002 (ID, DPRTCODE, DJLX, SQDH, ZT, SQYY, JJCD, YQQX, SQBMID, SQRID, SQSJ, SPBMID, SPRID, SPSJ, SPYJ,TDMC) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{djlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sqdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sqyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jjcd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{yqqx,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sqbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{spbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sprid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{spyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update B_H_002
DJLX = #{djlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SQDH = #{sqdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SQYY = #{sqyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JJCD = #{jjcd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YQQX = #{yqqx,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SQBMID = #{sqbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQRID = #{sqrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQSJ = #{sqsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SPBMID = #{spbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPRID = #{sprid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPSJ = sysdate,
SPYJ = #{spyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZDJSRID = #{zdjsrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZDJSRQ = sysdate,
ZDJSYY = #{zdjsyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TDMC = #{tdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_H_002
set DJLX = #{djlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SQDH = #{sqdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SQYY = #{sqyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JJCD = #{jjcd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, YQQX = #{yqqx,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SQBMID = #{sqbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQRID = #{sqrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQSJ = #{sqsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SPBMID = #{spbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPRID = #{sprid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPSJ = #{spsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SPYJ = #{spyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TDMC = #{tdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
